Class TeacherEnrollmentStudent

java.lang.Object
ticktocktrack.gui.TeacherEnrollmentStudent
public class TeacherEnrollmentStudent extends Object
Handles the process of enrolling students into specific classes by providing a user interface for selecting and managing student enrollments.

  • Constructor Details

    • TeacherEnrollmentStudent

      public TeacherEnrollmentStudent()

  • Method Details

    • showStudentSelectionDialog

      public static void showStudentSelectionDialog(List<Student> allStudents, String courseName, String section, int classId, String program)
      Displays a dialog to allow the teacher to select students for enrollment in a specified class.
      Parameters:
      allStudents - A list of all available students to select from.
      courseName - The name of the course for which students are being enrolled.
      section - The section associated with the course.
      classId - The unique identifier for the class in which students will be enrolled.
      program - The program or curriculum to which the class belongs.

    • filterStudents

      private static List<Student> filterStudents(List<Student> students, String section, String program, String yearLevel, Set<Integer> enrolledIds)
      Filters a list of students based on specified criteria such as section, program, year level, and exclusion of already enrolled student IDs.
      Parameters:
      students - The list of all students to filter.
      section - The section to filter by. Use "All" to include all sections.
      program - The program to filter by. Use "All" to include all programs.
      yearLevel - The year level to filter by. Use "All" to include all year levels.
      enrolledIds - A set of student IDs that are already enrolled and should be excluded.
      Returns:
      A filtered list of students matching the specified criteria.

    • populateStudentRows

      private static void populateStudentRows(List<Student> students, javafx.scene.layout.VBox container, javafx.scene.control.ListView<Student> selectedListView)
      Populates a container with rows representing students and allows selection for enrollment.
      Parameters:
      students - The list of students to display in rows.
      container - The container to populate with student rows.
      selectedListView - The list view that holds selected students.
